commands.name: az eventhubs cluster available-region
commands.summary: List the quantity of available pre-provisioned Event Hubs Clusters, indexed by Azure region.

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster create
commands.summary: Create an instance of an Event Hubs Cluster.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs cluster create --cluster-name
                            --resource-group
                            [--capacity]
                            [--location]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--provisioning-state]
                            [--sku {Dedicated}]
                            [--supports-scaling {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--tags]

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster delete
commands.summary: Delete an existing Event Hubs Cluster. This operation is idempotent.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs cluster delete [--cluster-name]
                            [--ids]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--yes]

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster list
commands.summary: List the available Event Hubs Clusters within an ARM resource group.

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster show
commands.summary: Get the resource description of the specified Event Hubs Cluster.

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster update
commands.summary: Update an instance of an Event Hubs Cluster.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs cluster update [--add]
                            [--capacity]
                            [--cluster-name]
                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--ids]
                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--provisioning-state]
                            [--remove]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--set]
                            [--sku {Dedicated}]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--supports-scaling {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--tags]

commands.name: az eventhubs cluster wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
